A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you put all the Star Wars issues aside\, you're left with something that isn't even a good movie. This review isn't because its a \"bad Star Wars\" movie\, its just a terrible movie that happens to be a Star Wars. I am a huge Star Wars fan: I go to SW Celebration\,  I cosplay Star Wars\,  I've defended Jar-Jar which is saying a lot. This movie took everything that TFA set up and literally throws it over the shoulder because it doesn't care or want it.
